article_title: Obamacare's Best Defense? 'It Could Have Been Worse'

article_metadata.author: Sally Pipes

og.description: Healthcare costs continue to rise under Obamacare. So the White House is trotting out a new defense of the law -- "it could have been worse." But Obamacare has made health costs worse -- much worse.
og.title: Obamacare's Best Defense? 'It Could Have Been Worse'
